page.title: 14PIPING
page.content: Pipe Major Evan Macrae born on the Black Isle and brought up on the Isle of Skye has been a piping instructor in schools in Fort William for nine years. Question.Why and how did you start Piping? Answer. Well I got an opportunity when I was eleven to learn by the Local Blacksmith, in Advasser,Isle of Skye,who was a piper and he offered to teach me. Question.Was it hard to learn? Answer. No I worked hard at it and tried hard to do what I was told and became successful. Question.Can you tell me about the history of Lochaber Pipe Band? Answer. It is now called the Lochaber
